website_summaries.verdict: Nice looking dresser with plenty of safety features built into it, so you can use it as your baby ages.
pros: Uses drawer safety stops in all six drawers to protect babies when they start moving on their own
Construction materials meet or exceed all ASTM safety standards
Sturdy, with four legs that will keep it upright
cons: Unit may have a strong chemical smell to it when you unbox it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but strongly odorous
customer_reviews.text: This chest of drawers looks great in our bathroom which has no storage, and works well for us. But the odor from the finish was very strong at first and did not go away for months! I would not use in a baby’s room!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect for baby's room
customer_reviews.text: Picking a dresser was tough and the reviews here really helped me, so I wanted to share mine as well! Purchased this and it arrived in perfect condition. Took my husband about 2-3 hours to fully assemble. The dresser is a great size, and very sturdy! Love that it can be secured to the wall as well. I'm 5'0 and my husband is 6'3, and the top of the dresser should work fine for a changing pad (good height for us both). The dresser is beautiful too, the color is perfectly white and love the curved lines. Great buy for the price, and I'm sure our daughter will be able to use this for years!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is overwhelming. I had to put it outside and I'm not sure when it will dissipate. I'm concerned that the finishes used are not safe and unless I can scrub it out with baking soda and air it out it will not be going in the house, much less the kids room. Update: I tried to contact the company by phone and email and got no response. I left it out in the shed for 3+ weeks with little improvement. I'm going to return this item as it is VERY odorous!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser,but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This dresser had wonderful reviews compared to many others I’ve read. Was feeling very optimistic about it. When it arrived it was very well packaged, but there were apparently a couple dings before being put in the packaging. It was generally a very easy dresser to assemble, took about 1 1/2-2hrs. The biggest disappointment though is the drawer size. The dresser itself is pretty deep, but the drawers are not. Will be trying to sell this now to get something else :( No sense in it taking up so much space in our smaller rooms for the storage capacity of a smaller dresser.
customer_reviews.author: cgant

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but bad workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy and is pretty heavy. I guess it would have worked well, if we were able to put it together. The quality control on this product is absolute garbage. The holes don't line up at all. This is the 4th piece we were trying to put together and we were just on Step 2. We purchased a crib earlier as well and it was well worth the effort. We were able to wiggle through some holes but not on this one. I will update the review with images as well. Get something else. It doesn't have to be this hard to put together a chest of drawers. Thanks to Amazon for amazing service on returning this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Whinoceros

customer_reviews.title: This dresser stinks like paint/toxins
customer_reviews.text: We bought this dresser after a lot of research and when it arrived I was impressed by its sturdiness. However, this was short lived when we opened the box, it was very smelly. We proceeded to build it thinking that the smell would decrease but it never did. After a week it smells like we just painted the room! It genuinely smells like an open can of paint and I’m not entirely comfortable that it really does meet the requirements for formaldehyde. Not suitable for a baby’s room; I didn’t even want it in my house being pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: samd13

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical smell that doesn’t go away - ever
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the people writing good reviews must not have noses attached to their faces. I’ve never experienced a piece of furniture reeking like this does. I have tried off-gassing outdoors, baking soda, vinegar and water, and charcoal. Nothing has made a bit of difference. I am not comfortable putting something that off-gases chemicals like this in my baby’s room!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy and solid, though the drawer fronts imply the drawers are deeper than they are, though I can still fit most of my folded clothes. I assembled the dresser almost entirely on my own and it took several hours, though a lot of the time was lost because I screwed the draw fronts in backwards. The exterior parts seem to be solid wood. The inside I can't quite tell, but it fits together and is very sturdy; even my mom was impressed, given the price. I would recommend it to anyone wanted a medium and affordable dresser, though it will definitely take two people to move given the weight. I've been using this product about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ixtaek

customer_reviews.title: Very study
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what to expect cuz I never bought any furniture online that I had to assemble. But I did expect some sort of sturdiness for the price that I had to pay for this dresser for my son. I have to say that it took us maybe an hour and I have to put it together is that. Very very sturdy dresser and it's really cute. I would definitely recommend buying from the seller. Just perfect for changing pad at the perfect height as well and that is something that was very important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS - Well two of Part B and no Part W
customer_reviews.text: The dresser came in with one part missing (actually they gave me two of Part B and no Part W). I've put together a lot of furniture; took my time - there is definitely an error in what was packed. I have to say this has actually rarely happened when I have purchased build your own furniture so I was surprised. BUT IT DID HAPPEN! MISSING A PART AND NOW THEY (delta) SAY THE PART IS BACKORDERED AND DO NOT KNOW WHEN THEY MIGHT RECEIEVE IT! They actually suggested I UN-ASSEMBLE it AND RETURN IT! CRAZY. I did search the reviews for "missing parts" and apparently this is not an uncommon issue with these Delta dressers. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Great overall for the price
customer_reviews.text: We love this dresser overall for the price we paid (approx. $160 after registry coupon). It was easy to install, up until one of the predrilled holes did not align at all. Fortunately, my husband was able to adjust the hole with a power tool and we got the pieces to go together. The drawers are decent and as sturdy as you'd expect with a dresser at this cost. I attempted several different box organizers in the drawers, all which didnt fit great and ended up being returned. I ended up buying "dial dream drawer organizers" from Target and they work out perfect. I also got "Interlocking drawer organizer set" from Target for smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This dresser was very well packaged. No items were dented or dinged in shipping. The instructions were clear. It took 3 hours to assemble. The dresser itself is sturdy, but does come with a wall mount for added security. Drawer capacity is good. The drawers do not pull out all the way which reduces tip over risk and prevents drawers from falling out or damaging their runners. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jorja229

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I liked this dresser very much. I was looking for a solid wood dresser instead of pressed wood and this is perfect. The color is very pretty and easy to find furniture to match. Its pretty heavy so dont have a fear of it turning but it comes with a wall mount as well. Instructions were a easy follow. The drawers are deep so good for storage. The only thing I would say is one of the drawers when pulling it out does wobble a tiny but when it gets to the lock mechanism that stops the drawers from coming out. Other than that perfect and for the price worth it.
customer_reviews.author: scottia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and it is sturdy, however, one star is deducted because the drawers jam pretty easily if you’re not careful. My husband made the connection that they tend to jam when you pull up on them ever so slightly as you’re pulling the drawer out. It’s easy to pull it up since they are very lightweight drawers and our newborn items are also lightweight. Other than that, I am satisfied with the dresser and would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is exactly what we needed for our new baby. It was easy to build and looks fantastic in the baby's room. I didn't notice a chemical smell that I've read in other reviews, either. I'm glad I didn't listen to those when I was searching. There is one issue I have, the drawers don't want to open all the way on the first try. I have to close them fully and then open them. Its only happened to 2 out of the 6. But other than that my husband and I are very happy with the purchase. And it matches the baby crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla L

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this - the chemicals that are reeking from this must be dangerous for any human being, BUT ESPECIALLY AN INFANT. I can NOT BELIEVE THAT AFTER THE SCANDAL OF FORMALDAHYDE IN WOOD FLOORS MADE IN CHINA, WE NOW HAVE THE SAME THING COMING FROM VIETNAM. We put all the pieces outside for a week,,and it still thinks of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie47

customer_reviews.title: Great but stinks
customer_reviews.text: I only rate this a 3 because of the crazy chemical smell it has! I read through reviews before purchasing and found one of the chemical smell and honestly blew it off because I thought it was some chic who was something short of hairy armpits and brushes her teeth without tooth paste (no offense). Anyway so I bought it and after I put it together and I put it in my daughters room and shut the door. After maybe an hour or 2 later I went in to vacuum and was smacked in the face with a horrible smell. Needless to say once I get that fixed, it will be perfect. It’s sturdy and really easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I thought (all sides of the pieces are finished and smoothened out, sturdy thickness). Nice packaging with most of the pieces individually wrapped. Easy to put together due to clear instructions. I love that the base board of the drawers is supported by a thick stripe of wood as opposed to being just a thin piece of board (most other dressers we ordered somewhere else were like that). The rounded edges, curved sides and overall finish look nice and durable, looks like these can go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid drawers
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put the dresser together and it cut the time in half. It was pretty simple and easy to follow with the instructions. We panicked momentarily when we thought we were shorted a couple pieces but the extra bag (red) had the items we needed. It is very heavy and does requires two persons to carry the box. Only downside is that the drawers are not very deep. Works well for infant clothes but will need to be replaced as our kiddo gets older as the clothes get larger in size.
customer_reviews.author: TSH17

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure some could tackle assembling this dresser on their own, but my husband and I assembled it together. It was very well explained, but it still took us a good two hours to put it together. I love that the parts are all separated by type. That made things a lot easier. The only "issue" we had was that there were no holes on the back for putting on the back panel. My husband used his drill, and it was super simple. It would have taken a lot longer with just a screwdriver. Overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CuteCuddlyCitten

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality perfect color to match crib
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, it wasn't horrible to put together once we figured out why the drawer wouldn't go in right. we installed the part of the drawer with the tracks on it backwards. Thankfully we only had put one drawer together wrong. Once it was corrected things went by fast with the other five. The good thing is the tracks are already installed on the boards. That is a step that I would absolutely detest. So overall I would say it is a good study dresser that didn't take all night putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Tee

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Delta could have done so much more with this unit. I don't understand why the drawer space is smaller than the spacing within the unit. For example, the height of the drawers could have been about another two inches. When assembling the unit, the length of the drawers does not go all the way to the back of the unit. More space could have easily been given to each drawer. Some drawers open and close smoothly; others don't. We did make sure we placed the drawers in the right section. Overall, my daughter and I believe the unit is very beautiful, but it a few more improvements is why I didn't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: amandamaya02

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, and horrible customer service from Delta.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe our luck. This is the second time we order something huge to assemble and an important part is missing (the bottom frame that holds the dresser together.) We contacted Delta and after reaching out the third time, finally someone responded. And apparently they have to order parts from somewhere and don't know when it will arrive on their end. We don't get updates or when they will deliver. All they said was 'some time in the future.' I hope my toddler gets his dresser before he graduates high school. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: SBrandt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dresser, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dresser I choose for my adult guest room to have room for clothes and hold a tv and small lamp. It is truly one of my Best Buy’s on Amazon to date, excellent craftsmanship, even painted finish, the hardware is strong and easily screws in without to much force. Simple RTA process, just follow the steps by pictures and/ or written instructions. Great price for a piece of solid wood furniture ,with proper/ normal care, you will be able to have for a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Completely in love with this dresser. Is very sturdy, incredible quality for the price, very well packed, easy to put together, the instructions are guiding you every step. I changed the knobs because wanted some knobs that match my daughter’s room decor! I love it. I was sceptic buying furniture on Amazon but again I am not disappointed at all. Me and my husband love it!
customer_reviews.author: Giulia Popa Ion

customer_reviews.title: Engineering Marvel - Great for Younger Kids - SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I have given up the assembled furniture for long time after have done some much IKEA-like install work in my early years of life. But COVID-19 changed everything, so I bought this one and assembled it in no time wasted. Every step of the way, I appreciated the engineering work very much. The holes are aligned so well, pre-drilled with anchors inside, no strip, no hassle or breaks. Every corner is round, better than the ones I bought from other places of kids store. I am planning to get all my future kids furniture from them if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great once you get it together but hard to build
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's nursery and have now purchased another one for my next child on the way. The dresser looks great, seems sturdy, has good capacity, the drawers slide nicely, and it looks great. My one and only issue with it is putting it together. My girlfriend and I built this the first time and she has a PHD in Bio Chem and I work in the medical field so we are used to following detailed instructions, yet we still struggled to put it together. It took many many hours and in the end my husband came home and helped so it took 3 adults several hours to assemble. Once it is assembled though it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing this product as my past experience with furniture that comes in a box that you have to put together has not been great. This looked very nice, had great reviews, and was at a good price - plus we already have a Delta brand crib and it was nice too, so we took a chance and I am glad we did. This thing is solid, not like cheap particle board. It took awhile to put together, but the instructions were straight forward and easy to follow. The drawers slide easily and there is alot of storage space. This is a fantastic dresser and is sturdy/affordable.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how Delta can get away with selling something that smells so toxic. Wish I noticed the reviews that mentioned it before. Didn't even get a chance to put it together. Opened the box and immediately noticed the extremely potent odor of whatever toxic chemicals that are used to make this dresser. Completely unacceptable... Returned immediately. At least Amazon cares about it's customers...
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser, buy on sale
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is pretty sturdy and big. Assembly was difficult because I had to redrill several holes that were not aligned correctly, and a few connectors/parts were missing. The drawers also need to be assembled based on whether they go in the left side or right side of the dresser, which is not stated in the instructions. The only complaint I have with the finished product is the drawers. They are smoothing sturdy but do not open evenly, so they wobble left and right if you don't pull them out perfectly straight.
customer_reviews.author: JP B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no odor
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dresser. I was paranoid after reading some reviews that it came with an “odor” but ours did not. My husband put it together in about 90 minutes and said the directions were well written and easy to follow, even letting you know which drawer goes on which side. (Our sons dresser was a different type and it didn’t explain it so we had to redo the drawers a few times to get it right but with this dresser it was clear). It’s a great piece and I recommend it to everyone. The price is great also for a solid piece!
customer_reviews.author: JM00004

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece, I was impressed at how thick the pieces are... very heavy but easy to put together. I did it by myself and I’m a petite woman (5 ft). It doesn’t look nor feel cheap by any means so I definitely feel like I got good bang for my buck. My only complaint is that there is a lot of wasted space behind and around the drawers. I feel like the drawers could have been made 2-3” deeper and 2-3” wider. Nonetheless, they are still pretty spacy and fit a lot. I’m overall happy with the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy children's dresser
customer_reviews.text: It (the white one) has a beautiful finish and is a sturdy dresser for this price. The finish is true white and matches our other white children's furniture items. The curved pieces look nice and go well with the toddler sleigh bed we have. Be aware that it has safety drawers--they only pull out halfway. While this is a good size, the drawers are not as wide, so it would not be ideal for adult-sized clothes. I ended up replacing the plain white knobs with some cute custom painted ones. I ordered them here
customer_reviews.author: Kimber L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this took some people “5 hours” to assemble. I’m 8 months pregnant and did it by myself in less than 2. I also read some people said it smelled like chemicals and mine did not. It smells like new manufactured wood, but nothing too strong. This is a very sturdy dresser and has a lot more storage than I expected. It is super cute, but is super heavy! Great quality and would recommend! I also appreciate that it shipped quickly and arrived with extra pieces in case I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan&Meghan Rech

customer_reviews.title: Great little dresser
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice dresser. First of all, the box is packed so well, that I think it could withstand a beating. It took about two hours to assemble with plenty of breaks. Second of all, the quality is terrific. I was worried, as I have not bought put together furniture very often, and it is hit or miss with those usually. I am very satisfied, and I look forward to years of use. Thank you for a great transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Quality sturdy dresser!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to match the baby’s Delta Crib. Color matches the rest of the delta collection perfectly. It took me and my husband about an hour and a half to put it together-which was worth it because the dresser is very sturdy and well made. It is just as sturdy if not more sturdy than our bedroom set we bought from rooms to go. The color is great, all the pieces are quality pieces, and the dresser actually seems to be bigger and have more room in the drawers than I would have thought! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FIU Student

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy and EASY to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three dressers for my kids and I wish I had purchased this brand for all three. It is built VERY well and so easy to assemble. It's sturdy, looks amazing and the drawers slide effortlessly. Kudos to the manufacturer for sending it with the drawer tracks and threaded bolt tighteners already installed (which cannot be said for other manufacturers). This helped insure proper assembly, ease and durability. I could not be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong stickers on the parts
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is beautiful, however it was so complicated to assemble, there is a big mistake on the instructions/sticker that made us go back to the first step when we were almost done. On page 13 the first step I’m guessing the stickers on the parts was incorrect, at the end when we needed to attach the back of the dresser the signs for the screws was on the front part and not on the back. Beside that we received the wrong color from the seller and we needed to wait another week for the right color, so if u order a head of time before planing to assemble just make sure it’s the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to assemble (but worth the price)
customer_reviews.text: Overall really great product, easy to assemble minus the drawers. They show you how you have to have the left drawers and right drawers so they go on the track correctly but all the pieces are labeled the same so it’s a little confusing and we had to redo one side entirely which added about 30 minutes to assembly time. It did take a couple hours to assemble but pieces are all labeled nicely so it wasn’t about finding pieces. It’s a heavy piece, solid, and the drawers are pretty deep for a children’s dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Was better than I thought. I read review about a horrible smell. Mine just smelt like new furniture. There were a lot of pieces to put together but it wasn’t difficult. It looks better in person than I anticipated. Best part is that the drawers are assembled with support underneath so no need to worry about the bass of the drawer fall out if my daughter tried to shove too much in the drawer. Very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy dresser! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is so worth the money!! After searching and searching, I finally broke down and ordered it. It’s so sturdy. The drawers line up great. Real wood. A kid can’t pull it on to themselves. Works as a changing table as well. Fits TONS of clothes! If you’re on the fence, get this one! It will not disappoint! We got the white one. It does not smell toxic like the reviews suggest. The box smell went away in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: lastingmemories.byellen

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell lasts FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: I can't really speak to the functionality as we haven't finished putting it together, but OHMYGOSH the smell, you guys. Believe the reviews that complain about this. When we got it we put all the pieces outside for a few days to air out. And then as some of the unpainted pieces were bleaching in the sun, we moved it into our garage. It sat there for 2 months and we just brought it in to put it together. IT STILL SMELLS. What on earth did they put on it?
customer_reviews.author: Review 1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fits changing pad nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fits a changing pad on it nicely with room to spare. Finding a dresser was so hard to do. We wanted great quality for a low price that could hold a changing pad. We took our chance with this one and we love it! I almost gave it 4 stars because it took awhile to build and was a lot of work. But honestly, that just means it is sturdy and put together well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - worth the money - very durable
customer_reviews.text: This shows up as a BIG package. And heavy. I was able to get it into my Livingroom and begin assembly with some help. Assembly is very easy. Just make sure your pieces are facing the right direction. The directions have the letter for each piece called out but they do not show the direction as well. Be sure not to get pieces backwards. Once assembled, all drawers are aligned and open and shut smoothly. It is a very nice finish. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy very heavy dresser
customer_reviews.text: Very solid dresser. Delta included a tip over strap I used a different one thag I feel is better, but still happy they included one. As long as you follow the instructions and don't skip ahead you'll be fine. I jad a problem with one of the pieces not being drilled right. Delta sent me a replacement in a week no charge to me. So they back their products. For the size I would think it would have more storage, but it has enough for a child or toddler.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to build this dresser. I did have to secure the slats in between the drawers because they were going to be very loose, so I used a little duct tape at the ends. It's hard to understand until you put this together. After that, the drawers were the most time consuming for me, my daughter and I made it through. The final product was well worth it and it looks great! My girls love their new dresser! The dresser was well packaged and I want to thank all the hard working citizens of Vietnam that contributed to making this possible for my girls! God bless you 🙏🏻
customer_reviews.author: I♡Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Nursery dresser
customer_reviews.text: This is such a solid dresser! Directions were easy and love how it looks in my baby girls nursery. The drawers are huge. I also decided to replace he knobs with some I got from hobby lobby...
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Baby/Children's Dresser. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this dresser for our nursery room to double as a changing table and it fits in a fairly small room very well and took about 1.5 hrs for us to build together. We did have some slight problems when we went to put in the drawers, we didn't see that there is a specific way to put together the left side drawers vs the right side drawers. But took 5 min to fix them. Its a great color and finish and very sturdy. The drawers are a bit smaller than I would want to my own dresser but perfect for a baby or children's dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Levi J.

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I liked this dresser so much I bought a second one when we found out baby #2 was coming along. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of assembly. It's easy to put together except for the back panel. Or maybe mine is just defective? The manufacturer has starter holes for the screws along one side of the piece (along the bottom in photo) but not along any other area. Perhaps my screwdrivers also suck but this became extremely frustrating! I don't recall if our first dresser had this issue or not. Otherwise it's a pretty solid dresser.
customer_reviews.author: YippieHippie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, storage space smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Super easy to put together as there weren't all that many parts. My only annoyances are that the drawers could easily be three inches longer towards the back. There's an unnecessary huge gap back there and the drawer storage space is fairly small, also because the sides of the drawers are much shorter than the fronts. All this to say - don't judge storage space by the overall size of the dresser. Also, a couple of drawers barely scrape along the edge when you open and close them. Will still work just fine and love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this dresser
customer_reviews.text: Really well built with good quality hardware and wood. Not light weight or flimsy at all. Well packaged to survive shipping. Stickers on each piece made assembly go a lot faster. Really happy with the purchase. Only drawback to unit being so heavy is that if it is assembled in an already occupied bedroom there is fairly strong off-gassing from the painted surfaces. May want to unpack and set painted pieces out in the garage for a week before assembling.
customer_reviews.author: NSL142

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the nursery I'm creating for my granddaughter. Just for the record, I'm a 72 year old woman who has slowed down a fair bit. I found the assembly instructions easy to follow and very easy to do. It took me around 2 hours after it was unpacked and organized. That included a couple of breaks. The furniture is beautiful and very sturdy. I would never have thought it was an assembly required piece, if I saw it somewhere. I liked that the hardware came with a bag of "extra" parts, just in case. I was missing one screw and my dog ate a dowel, but I had extras, so no problems. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla B. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Dresser for baby, children, teens
customer_reviews.text: THis is a beautiful dresser. I bought it for my daughter's 10 year old birthday- she's getting a total room makeover. The dresser has a sturdy legs and stance that prevents it from toppling. The drawers are deep and has that latch feature that prevents it from coming out completely. I also love the Espresso colors. Great purchase, better than what i could have found locally.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Teacha-LaRonde

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: Really nice dresser but had a really strong chemical smell that gave me a headache. Let it air out in the patio for a week and most of the smell is gone now. Painted inside the drawers with an odor blocking primer as suggested by some other reviewers and there is still a slight smell. Dresser easily gets scratches scraping off some of the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is sophisticated grown up furniture!
customer_reviews.text: We needed more drawer storage under the new TV and cable box. This came in black cherry that blended in with the other mahogany furniture in the room. Understated elegance. Not cheap DYI furniture at all! This is very substantial furniture. Fortunately our UPS guy dropped this big box in the foyer with a heavy duty hand truck. We took the pieces up the curved staircase to assemble. It took some time since there are lots of bolts and screws but that makes this so solid. We did not detect a smell. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Main Line Mama

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Good product, sturdy, Nick color, took an hour to put together. One star because of the chemical smell. Put it in my daughter’s room and immediately you smelled it. It’s from the drawers. Updates- a week has passed it gets better, but still a half way to go. Will bump the rating to 4 when it is totally clear, only hoping that day will come.
customer_reviews.author: yunner

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Drawers stick which is the big bummer. I think 1 out of the 6 are smooth. The ones that stick can easily come off if pulled to hard, which with a toddler is more often going to happen. A pain since it’s put together, more of a hassle to take apart and return. Nice looking and seems sturdy but drawer capacity is small and not deep. Fits 3/4T folded only 1 row when with IKEA you can fit 2 rows of clothes FYI. Pro-good price, looks nice especially if you get different knobs to change the look Con-drawers stick, capacity is limited. No one/where to ask about how to fix drawers sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality will surprise you
customer_reviews.text: I expected the typical particle board material but this piece is made from "real" wood. Drawer sides and drawer backs are good quality laminated but not particle board. The back is cosmetic and the drawer bottoms are pressed or synthetic but very adequate nontheless. Would definitely buy this again. Assembly is straight forward - instructions are impecable; just expect to go step-by-step. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Made for Children, but Adults like it too!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is made for kids, but if you're an adult and space is at a premium, this will work just fine! Follow the instructions carefully. Remember to go back and tighten bolts, but do not use the might of Samson to tighten. Tight enough is tight enough. Double check everything, and lastly, top off your purchase with a table runner or some kind of covering to protect the top. If you're missing hardware, there's a bag with extra pieces that come with the hardware. Don't drink booze before building this unit. That could ruin your work and be dangerous. Happy dresser drawing!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I did want white but that was out but the grey looks just as awesome. Didn't realize how tall it was going to be, in 5'3/5'4 so it's a bit tall about not where I won't be able to change baby on top. There was only like one part of the directions that were a bit confusing but I figured it out. It took me about 3ish hours to put together myself
customer_reviews.author: Roelee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but wrong color and damaged pieces
customer_reviews.text: The dresser looks great, but the color is too red for me though. I ordered the espresso, but it’s cherry espresso. They need to do a better job of presenting their color options. The description said espresso. I also received a piece that was damaged. I was able to order a new top for free from Delta themselves, but the new top was also damaged. It was not damaged as much as the first one, but it was still disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy Tale Princess

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughters put this together themselves. They put a couple pieces on wrong and had to remove and try again. Follow the directions carefully and it isn’t too bad. This piece is sturdy and offers great storage. You can switch out the knobs easily if you want a more custom look. This is the second dresser we have bought and would recommend to others. I like that other color options are available. We have one gray and one white. This dresser has done well with our recent move and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, beautiful dresser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dresser with the add-on changing station. The dresser is solid wood, with the exception of the bottom of the drawers. However, the drawer base is reinforced by solid wood, so I think it will be just fine. It is a heavy piece of furniture! I consider myself very handy putting things together, and it took me about 2 hours to put this together. Instructions were easy to follow. It wasn't difficult to put together, but it will take time because you have to assemble each drawer. I recommend this dresser. Happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: flywatt

customer_reviews.title: and good quality, hardware to assemble is nice as well
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth 5 stars, but I’ll explain you why I gave it 4 stars... the wood is heavy, and good quality, hardware to assemble is nice as well... and the final product looks very beautiful... What is missing is more precise instructions for assembling drawers. Drawers need more instructions & guidance on assembly, otherwise many people will not get it properly, or will have to do lots of trials & error. I got it right after few trials & errors, and the assembly took about 4-6 hours... Anyways, after the product is assembled, it’s definitely 5 stars 😊
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay for price. Not my favorite purchase. It was the most difficult piece to assemble of everything purchased so far for our baby. Not impossible, just takes some time and patience. Looks wise I like it so far. Quality- there is already a small ding from brushing against the wall when moving. Wall does not have a mark, just the dresser. It does feel secure with wall mount that was included and I think we will be able to get good use out of it. The dresser drawers open and close well- no issue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Dance

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd baby. For our first we bought $2,000 furniture. It didn’t hold up at all. For our second we spent about $1,300. Again, it didn’t hold up. We saw this dresser for $250 on prime and figured what do we have to lose since it’s free returns. We were BLOWN away with the amazing quality and ridiculously LOW price. It’s pine wood, easy to assemble and phenomenal quality. I am so happy I ordered this! Highly recommend! It’s way better quality than the other two sets we’ve had and a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Buddfamily4

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny 1st one bought still going strong 7 years later
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love their products so durable and long lasting! I bought this exact same dresser for my oldest in 2012 it's still rock solid! My youngest wanted a pink dresser I made the mistake of going with a different manufacturer and the think collapsed on itself while assembling paid 160! I said forget this and spent the extra 70 to get this one and dont regret it for a second. This is already built and in use in my daughters room and she loves it just like her sister
customer_reviews.author: naomi cole

customer_reviews.title: great great deal
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is a dream! Actually using it in my apartment bedroom, but the black finish is very high quality.. wood is very high quality, I expect this to last a long time. I am very impressed and got the dresser for only $160 with amazon prime, great great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shanyce Rovon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: The 6 drawer dresser is beautifully made. Gorgeous gray color. Solid heavy wood. I would recommend had it not been for the difficulty of putting it together. The drawers do no fit flush and opening and closing the drawers are a pain. It's as if the rails are rough making the traction difficult. I ordered because I made a previous purchase with Walmart and what they sent to me was a bunch of broken boards. Thinking Amazon would be the better option it turns out I should've just went to a local furniture store. Maybe the outcome would have been more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Tre Rose

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought me a new TV much bigger than the old one. I needed a stand to fit into my small room. Decided on this Children's Delta Dresser. I have had furniture from this company before and know that it is pretty good quality compared to a lot of the furniture that is needed to be assembled. My son and I put this together in a few well spent hours together. Very much happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Baubles & Bangles

customer_reviews.title: Worth it in QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 6 dresser drawer 2 yrs ago for our nursery and loved it! When baby #2 was coming, we bought the 3 drawer dresser for my toddler’s new room and they both have the same great quality! Easy to install. Heavy and sturdy. I’m not afraid of it tipping over when the drawers are open and think they will last a life time. Must buy. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Phan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Buildable. Yes really.
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest about getting furniture requiring assembly. Most of the time it's awful. Or if it's simple, the material must then be really cheap and the final product leaves you unsatisfied. This drawer is the magic combination of beauty and buildability. Even the instructions were clear. My son loves it and I'm a hard working daddy who now gets to watch football tomorrow. Someone out there got this one very right. Make furniture great again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not smooth
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quite a chore. Two adults, 2.5 hours, and you definitely need a drill. You can't assemble this without a drill. The wood is solid and heavy and good quality. I'd be totally happy with this if the drawers pulled out smoothly. We took our time and put the drawers together really well, but there's just enough margin of error in there that the drawers don't slide smoothly. If you want high quality materials, this is it. Maybe it will turn out perfect for someone who is handier than we are :)
customer_reviews.author: nietzsche

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This went in my little girl's room. It's very pretty and very sturdy. Some reviews complained of a smell. We didn't get that. It took my husband a few hours to assemble on his own and I didn't hear any cuss words so I say it's fairly easy to put together. He did say the instructions were weird. My girls have been using it for 2 months now and it doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: beautiful wood tone
customer_reviews.text: So very impressed with the high quality of this dresser, beautiful wood tone , a rich expresso cherry and drawers hold alot and very strong and sturdy and instructions very clear to follow, and has a beautiful clear finish on the wood. It was packaged with the greatest of care , so none of the pieces were scratched. A beautiful qualitiy piece of furniture.I also bought with it the Stork Craft Kenton 5 Drawer Universal Dresser-Expresso and the Home Styles 5542-401 Bermuda Headboard Twin and they all matched so beautifully together wood tone wise. Very Satisfied and I highly recommend these items to others.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Would not screw in. Took three hours to put together
customer_reviews.text: The dresser took us three hours to put together with two people. The issue we had was when it came to screwing one main side in, it would not screw in. You would keep screwing and it wouldn't hold. There was a hole but no screw peice inside. We were able to put everything else together, but I worry because one side has one less screw it may be less stable.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Fan

customer_reviews.title: WTF Drawers Don't Fit on Right side!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to put this together and everything was going smoothly untill I got to the drawers None of the right hand drawers fit😡😡😡😡 It is 5 am and I am so pissed off I have tried every freaking configuration All the drawer pieces are the same The left ones fine The right ones overlap the side Never again I purchase RTA all the time and have never run into a problem like this before I am LIVID!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy weiner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece!  Pay attention to directions
customer_reviews.text: Very nice solid piece of furniture. Sturdy and arrived without a scratch. A timeless dresser that will last years. You have to fully assemble it and you do need to pay attention to the directions because when it says right drawer and left drawer read carefully. Was being a typical “Man” as my wife says..lol and skimmed instructions and had to reassemble a couple drawers due to rails not being put on correct sides. But, the wood is solid and took the screws without a problem twice.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with Delta as a company. This dresser is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best pieces of furniture that I have purchased...anywhere. It is such great quality that when my husband was putting it together, he wanted to know who made this quality craftsmanship. Usually we now find furniture made out of plywood that falls apart in a couple of years but this dresser was made out of wood and is very well built. The color is gorgeous! It is very quite sturdy as well. I am very impressed. There is a lot of drawer space and they are very reinforced. This thing will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Y

customer_reviews.title: Cute but confusing assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love this dresser after we figured out the "A" (front of the drawers) has an Up/Down side its confusing because it has the slot for the bottom of the dresser to slip in and the same holes on each side. However, when we assembled and put the drawers in the dresser the edge hit the side of the dresser (it stuck out too far to the right or left). We then realized one side of the drawer is longer than the other. It was an easy fix and when all is said and done it is absolutely adorable! just be careful with the front piece of the drawers when assembling!
customer_reviews.author: Patty J

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and its beautiful. It is seriously much better than I expected, especially for the price. I am so pleased with it. My husband put it together in about 2 hours, with interruptions from our children. Another review mentioned something about the drawers not coming out all the way and after it's been put together I can attest that they do, I can pull them all the way out. If I was in a pinch I'd use this dresser for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Merrily

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is AMAZING for the price. It is solid wood and very sturdy. It looks very nice and was easy enough to assemble. The directions were very easy to follow, it took a few hours by myself at 9 months pregnant. 1 drawer was cracked down the middle when it arrived but after maybe 5 minutes on the phone with delta they are sending me a new one in 2 days. That’s awesome customer service! I didn’t notice a bad smell, it just smells like new furniture. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Macal

customer_reviews.title: We were looking for a very sturdy dresser for our nursery that would not break the ...
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a very sturdy dresser for our nursery that would not break the bank. This dresser is just that. The front legs do not allow it to tip forward easily. It took my husband about two hours to assemble. The drawers slide easily in and out and are very deep. The only negative is the smell. There is a strong paint odor. I left the drawers open for a few days to air it out but the smell persists. Finally, after 4 days it smelled less strong. I am hoping with time this will go away.
customer_reviews.author: G Sp

customer_reviews.title: Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and attractive piece of furniture upon first glance. Sadly, the manufacturer used the cheapest possible glides for the drawers making them noisy and hard to open and close. What looks good as furniture is rendered annoying and practically useless by this one short cut. And really, who is going to return this once it is assembled? I am annoyed and feel ripped off. Just don't.
customer_reviews.author: nancy burr

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to get some of the screws mixed up when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Right before putting this together I put a different dressing together. It was so easy so when I went to put this together I thought it would be similar. There are two screws of similar size but different lengths. I mixed them up ...and accidently screwed two of them through the top of the dresser - now I have two ugly holes on the top of the dresser. My fault but in fairness the other dresser had much better directions so I think they could do better
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had none of the negative experiences noted by the one star ratings. I read the lower ratings before purchasing, so I looked for anything along the lines of what was cited, and found everything in order, the parts (including extras) were all there and the instructions were good. No noticeable smell in either the cabinet or the drawers. I found it very stable and a good looking piece of furniture, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis G

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Great looking dresser minus some scratches on the surface. Major turn off though is the horrible chemical smell. Like other reviewers I've tried everything to get the smell out and a week later we are still afraid to put babys clothes in it. Safe yourself the headache from the fumes and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful dresser.
customer_reviews.text: We love this dresser. I bought it to match the Delta Archer crib in Dark Chocolate and they match great. We almost purchased a slimmer dresser and I'm so glad we bought this one. It will allow more room on top for a changing pad and changing items. Putting the dresser together took my husband and me a little over an hour, you put together the main part and then have to assemble each drawer. It was pretty straightforward and all drawers are straight, very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Clasen

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell stunk up my house
customer_reviews.text: One of my worst Amazon purchases ever. Terrible smell, aired parts out for over a month with a window open, cleaned with vinegar and baking soda, still stunk. Had to disassemble, stuff back in the box and get returned to Amazon. Took a week to get the smell out of my house. Didn't get a full refund due to condition of the packaging. Can't believe Delta would sell children's furniture with such overwhelming VOCs. Management should be in jail.
customer_reviews.author: B. Spagnuolo

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these (in two different colors and from two different stores) after reading tons of reviews and comparing prices on what seemed like millions of dressers for my kids' rooms. These had excellent reviews, and the price is unbeatable. Both dressers arrived in great shape (packaged well), were easy enough to put together, and are very solid. No problems at all with either dresser. Would purchase again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: MrsFtz

customer_reviews.title: Niece's baby present
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect fit, size, and color for my brand new niece's room! My sister loved how the drawers had a stopping point, they slide out nicely, it is sturdy, and there is a decent weight to this dresser. Not that particle board stuff. There was also an extra bottom board piece to each drawer for more stability. Her husband assembled the whole thing, no problems, no missing pieces, or extra pieces left over! We also bought the removable changing table topper and pad to go on top of the dresser. Although there are just baby clothes in there right now, I think this piece of furniture will last her many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: rita chipman

customer_reviews.title: Great for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: I love this dresser for our infants nursery. It took my husband maybe 20-30 mins to put it together and my 6 year old daughter helped as well. It is heavy, sturdy and the drawers close easily. It holds plenty of clothes for an infant. But as they grow into a school age kid, you’ll have to upgrade as the clothes become bigger. But for the price, I love the value of this dresser!
customer_reviews.author: The Noll Girls

customer_reviews.title: Working great and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I saw some bad reviews for this but I didn't experience any issues with assembly or defects. It's working very well and looks very nice. I'm using it for my baby boy's nursery. I only wish the drawers held more, but other than that I think this was a good buy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: 💗💗💗💗💗Love love love it 💗💗💗💗💗
customer_reviews.text: I love this dresser. It was easy for me to put together. Its good wood. Heavyweight quality wood. Looks perfect in the baby's room. I'm going to use it for storage and a changing station. I will defiantly be buying this product again for a dresser in the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheless

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase . It was very easy to assemble! I did it by myself even with no help From my husband :) matching the bed i bought from them !! Good quality. Only i wish it was alittle bigger long wise so i could Put more inside , but it has good amount of space ... i juat over-bought clothing lol
customer_reviews.author: Kaya Teboul

customer_reviews.title: Possible defect?
customer_reviews.text: I brought this dresser to match the delta crib that we also have. When assembling, my partner noticed the screws came through the top of the dresser. He followed all instructions that were given in the manual. Since it was a pain for him to put together, we decided to keep the dresser and just cover the screws with decor. Other than this issue, I like it. The drawers are pretty spacious and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Griffy

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in a rather small box. The entire item needed assembly. It looks bit intimidating at first but the instructions are super easy! Loved that the item was well packaged and secured. Arrived without any flaws. I got the cherry brown and it looks very pretty, just as pictured. With two people putting it together I'd say it took us a little over an hour to put together. Not more than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdier than most dressers I have bought online, one problem...
customer_reviews.text: One of the drawers came with two left rails and was one of the last things I put together. I had to go to lowes and buy my own set of drawer rails to fix this problem. For some people less inclined to deal with this type of issue it may be a problem. I definitely wasn't about to disassemble the whole thing and ship it back. Beyond that it is straight forward to assemble but some of the pieces are pretty heave and big. Might need two people to set it up at times.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Myers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dresser. Much bigger than I expected. The color is very very nice. Goes well with my same color sleigh bed. Very easy to put together. But the box it can in was massive heavy Wow! I could barely drag it inside!! I live this dresser. Well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser and reasonably priced. My only complaint is the drawer bottoms are made of flimsy thin veneer, they fit into slots and sit there. The fancy furniture that you don't have to assemble probably has the bottoms glued and nailed. These drawers do have a brace under the veneer that will hopefully help some of the weight. Easy assembly, probably took my less that 2hrs. No issues with parts or pieces, everything was there. Included the anti tip kit, which I made sure to get on cuz my kid is a climber!
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

product_meta.title: Delta Children Universal 6 Drawer Dresser, White
product_meta.description:
Style:6 Drawer| Color:White"A nursery must-have, the simply styled 6 Drawer Dresser from Delta Children is crafted to coordinate with all of the brand's cribs. Featuring slightly curved legs and easy-to-grasp knobs, its durable metal glide system with safety stops prevents drawers from falling out. All Delta Children dressers meet the requirements of ASTM F2057, the voluntary industry tip over standard for dressers. For your children's safety, only purchase dressers that comply with this standard. For additional security, Delta strongly recommends that all dressers in your home be anchored; all Delta dressers include a wall anchor. To learn how to properly secure your dresser, please see the product assembly instructions or visit our website. "

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Eclipse 6-drawer double dresser was designed with a simple look and a sophisticated feel. The gorgeous piece combines simple, yet chic style with superb functionality. The 6 generously sized drawers open and close smoothly on durable metal glides and will grow with your child from infant to adult. Some assembly required. JPMA certified.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Delta Children Universal 6 Drawer Dresser in White
Drawer Dresser dimensions - 48.5" L x 20.75" W x 34.75" H | Drawer dimensions (each) – 24.25” W x 13.5” D x 5.5” H
Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards
Available in six popular finishes: Grey, White, Espresso Cherry, Dark Chocolate, Black or Black Cherry Espresso. Pair this dresser with any Delta Children items in the same finish
Assembly required. Frame is solid wood and all other components are composite wood products. Dresser features smooth metal glide system with safety stops to prevent drawers from pulling out

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,994 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
